item.title: Curated Collection of Teaching Materials
item.description: Applied Linear Models (STAT3012 at USYD) So I'm trying something new for teaching… Totally redesigned the slides, added a “Fun fact” to pay a homage to Ronald Fisher, and getting down with foundational concepts of experimental design (as per Bailey 2008). Maybe I should hold a short trivia at the end? ðŸ¤” #statsed pic.twitter.com/bxlFUq8Db0 - Emi Tanaka ðŸŒ¾ (@statsgen) May 10,…
